item.title: By: AIWAC
item.dc:creator: AIWAC
item.description:
R. Binyamin was an interesting person, even if his positions were radical and at times factually wrong (let's just say the issue of the Yishuv and the Nazis is not as simple as he posits).
I remember reading somewhere that members of the Mizrachi - none of whom were remotely close to his positions - mourned him respectfully when he passed.
IIRC, Yosef Gorny gave him pretty thorough treatment in his book "ZIonism and the Arabs".
